colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @045A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON ZHAL BZHI'I GTOR MA DANG 'BREL PA'I BAN PON MTSUN GSOL NAG PHYOGS GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD ZER BA'I DPE RNYED PA'I MTSUN GSOL GZHIR BYAS NAS CHOS RJE MING CAN WA GINDRA SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
